mapper.select: SELECT B.USER_NM AS ID, DATE_FORMAT(A.REQ_DATE,'%m-%d') AS REQ_DATE, D.CODE_NM AS REQ_STATUS, C.PRJ_NAME AS PRJ_ID, CONCAT(F.USER_NM, ' ', G.CODE_NM) PM, DATE_FORMAT(A.START_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS START_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(A.END_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS END_DATE, A.PLACE, E.CODE_NM AS REQ_GROUP FROM REQUESTS A LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.ID = B.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN projects C ON A.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE D ON A.REQ_STATUS = D.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE E ON A.REQ_GROUP = E.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTNEMPLYRINFO F ON A.PM = F.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE G ON F.GRADE = G.CODE WHERE REQ_ID = #{reqId}

SELECT REQ.RED_ID, CASE WHEN A.LARGE_CATEGORY = 'ETC' THEN A.MIDDLE_CATEGORY ELSE B.CAT_NAME END AS MIDDLE_CATEGORY, A.ASSET_SN AS ASSET_SN, CASE WHEN H.CODE_NM = '기타' THEN A.MAKER ELSE H.CODE_NM END AS MAKER, C.USER_NM AS USER, REQ.ASSET_ID, CASE WHEN A.USE_GROUP = 'USER' THEN G.USER_NM WHEN A.USE_GROUP = 'ORG' THEN K.ORGNZT_NM WHEN A.USE_GROUP = 'PRJ' THEN L.PRJ_NAME ELSE NULL END AS USE_ID, CASE WHEN A.RCPT_GROUP = 'USER' THEN E.USER_NM WHEN A.RCPT_GROUP = 'ORG' THEN M.ORGNZT_NM WHEN A.RCPT_GROUP = 'PRJ' THEN J.PRJ_NAME ELSE NULL END AS RCPT_ID FROM REQUESTDETAIL REQ LEFT OUTER JOIN ASSET A ON REQ.ASSET_ID = A.ASSET_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN category B ON A.MIDDLE_CATEGORY = B.CAT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTNEMPLYRINFO C ON A.USE_ID = C.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTNEMPLYRINFO D ON A.RCPT_ID = D.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE H ON A.MAKER_CODE = H.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTNEMPLYRINFO G ON A.USE_ID = G.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTNORGNZTINFO K ON A.USE_ID = K.ORGNZT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PROJECTS L ON A.USE_ID = L.PRJ_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTNEMPLYRINFO E ON A.RCPT_ID = E.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTNORGNZTINFO M ON A.RCPT_ID = M.ORGNZT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PROJECTS J ON A.RCPT_ID = J.PRJ_ID WHERE REQ.REQ_ID = #{reqId} AND A.USAGE_STAUTS = 'U1' ORDER BY REQ.REQ_ORDER

SELECT E.USER_NM, E.ESNTL_ID, DATE_FORMAT(A.APRV_DATE,'%m-%d') AS APRV_DATE, A.REQ_STATUS, A.APRV_ORDER FROM APRVTARGET A LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTNEMPLYRINFO E ON E.ESNTL_ID = A.TARGET_ID WHERE A.REQ_ID = #{reqId} ORDER BY APRV_ORDER
